articles.description: Hundreds of business groups are asking Congress to pass legislation that would allow firms to deduct PPP loan business expenses.
articles.content:
Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi (R), D-Calif., and Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer, D-N.Y., hold a press briefing on Capitol Hill on Nov. 6, 2020.

articles.title: This is the top housing market in the country heading into 2021 — hint: It’s not San Francisco - MarketWatch
articles.description: While San Francisco may not have the nation’s hottest housing market these days, its influence over the country’s top markets remains.

articles.title: Indonesia receives first COVID vaccine from China's Sinovac - Reuters
articles.description: Indonesia received its first shipment of coronavirus vaccine from China on Sunday, President Joko Widodo said, as the government prepares a mass inoculation programme.
